about_me_description: Since I was a child, I have always been passionate about technology, and today I have the opportunity to express my creativity by doing what I love. For the past {{year}} years, I have been developing and refining my programming skills. I have solid experience with both front-end and back-end technologies, including React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vue.js, and more. Although my main focus is on front-end development, I am always open to new opportunities to keep learning and growing.
